title: Did Starbucks Refuse Free Product to Marines Serving in Iraq?
subtitle: A rumor that Starbucks refused free product to Marines serving in Iraq, saying the company didn't support the war or anyone taking part in it, is both old and false.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Starbucks refused free product to Marines serving in Iraq, saying the company didn't support the war or anyone taking part in it.
